title: Inting or having an off game?
body:
I'm starting to think players that get enough reports for inting need to be manually reviewed. 
The problem with an automatic system is the bot that gives the banhammer could ban someone who went 0/15, but wasn't inting - rather a complete monkey opposed to not banning someone blatantly runnung down mid giving 15.

People are getting tired of this system, where saying "kys" can be usually an instant perm ban, but inting doesnt get reviewed.

replies.body: The issue is that it takes 100's to 1000's of reports for it to be ever checked (similar with a few other instances of reports as well)

They do get manually reviewed eventually, but bans for in game offences tend to be a lot slower, and you've already understood why it seems. Generic toxic chat (which is the most common) is easy to detect for the automated system, there are more nuanced cases as well but it takes less nuance in a gameplay offence to create significant doubt in automation than in chat, which means some don't get hit until they get manually reviewed (which happens often but is a slower process overall).

The result is that the automated system is a lot slower to ban in game offences, because it needs to be sure, or that the slower manual reviews pick them up first. It's designed that way to prevent people who just had a really bad game from getting banned. It sucks that it's as slow as it is, and it could definitely be better.

For now, the best thing you can do if you see an intent feeder/someone doing toxic gameplay stuff that just isn't being punished is to submit a support ticket to get it manually reviewed.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I will say right off the bat though, that support can't give you any details of another players account, so you will only get a generic response along the lines of "thanks for your report". Don't expect them to give you a confirmation of any punishment because they aren't allowed to.

What the heck is inting? some guy in an aram just accused me of it and asked for me to be reported for it... because he just abused me saying i keep being caught out (which i dont think i did) so i stood at the back of my team before they started to fight.. and...because i ran when they all died... apparently that's a reportable thing? I'd name names but /shrug
